name: Prevent Stealage - Deviantart
description: Stops you, ie. the person who installs this theme, from copy-pasting DeviantArt literature and journals. Does NOT stop other people from copy-pasting your stuff. This theme proves how easy it would be for DeviantArt to implement this plagiarism prevention system. Inspired by a suggestion in the DA forums.

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)

additional_info: Do not complain here if your thing is stolen. This is purely to demonstrate the concept. If your stuff is stolen, take it up with the DA staff here 23/01/14: Fixed code broken by DA update.
